mapper.select: select code, id, b.book_code, to_char(add_date,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi') add_date, title, author,sale_class, sale_price, rental_price,img from cart c, book b where b.book_code=c.book_code and id=#{id}
mapper.insert: insert into cart(code, id, book_code, add_date) values(cart_code,#{id} ,#{book_code},sysdate)
mapper.delete: delete from cart where code=#{cartCode} and id=#{id}
